> Anything I should be concerned about? Is there any particular environment in settings.py where STATICFILES_STORAGE should not be set to this?

Nah, I'm pretty sure this is how we do it in other projects. [Pontoon, for example.](https://github.com/mozilla/pontoon/blob/master/pontoon/base/storage.py)
